title: The Day the Dollar Falls EN Sub avi
description:
What does top model Gisele Bundchen and rapper Jay-Z in common with professional investors such as Jim Rogers and politicians in Iran, Kuwait, Iraq, Qatar and China? Doubts concerning the Dollar and a preference for the Euro! Why? A Advancing vision like the drama entitled: The Day that the Dollar Falls. It seems like the scenario of this television production is becoming reality.

Do we live on a soap bubble? Can the American economy, full with large debts, collapse and sweep the Europeans away in a free fall? The days of the dollar as a world currency are over? And how realistic is the fear for a recession such as those of 1929?

This much wanted documentary shows the detailed doom scenario of the American economy collapse, an possibility which comes closer and closer...
